entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Investigate improving JIT heuristics with machine learning #92915
    9.0.0
  • Understand and improve ConfigurationBinder Source Generator incremental behavior #92914
    8.0.0
  • Support dsym bundles in symbol packages/indexing #92911
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] WBT: Blazor tests on windows failing with `Failed to bind to address` for random ports #92910
  • Name of WebAssembly tools in VS setup doesn't deliniate what a versionless description is #92907
  • Consider using memfd_create instead of shm_open in MemoryMappedFile if it's available #92905
    9.0.0
  • dotnet trace convert causes a crash on s390x #92891
  • [browser] Rollup removes `webpackIgnore` comments in release builds #92888
    9.0.0
  • Excessive zero extension #92887
    9.0.0
  • [browser] TensorPrimitivesTests.ConvertToHalf_SpecialValues `-Infinity` #92885
    9.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Baseservices runtime tests failed in Mono fullAOT llvm job #92883
    9.0.0
  • Implement real fix for C5271 in IJW test build #92879
  • JsonObjectCreationHandling.Populate not working with parameterized constructors #92877
    8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Zero SIMD vectors with movi on arm64 #92873
    9.0.0
  • [browser] Unit tests for generated code in JSInterop #92870
    9.0.0
  • Native AOT `StackFrame` method info #92869
  • JIT Arm64: Incorrectly optimizes out narrowing #92865
    8.0.0

Closed

  • NativeAOT Checked smoke tests are taking a long time #91296
  • Test failure: Loader\\binding\\tracing\\BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow\\BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow.cmd #92236
    9.0.0
  • .NET 8 AOT Mac OSX x64 segmentation fault #92894
    8.0.0
  • icudt_EFIGS.dat blocked by firewall #89073
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: X509KeysStorageFlags.IgnorePrivateKeys #84267
    Future
  • Error in `ImmutableArray` initialization using C#12 collection literals #92022
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json: Exception thrown trying to deserialize a List<JsonNode> or JsonNode [] from a JSON array containing a null entry, e.g. [null]. #92902
  • Add initial Span<T> access to creation of ImmutableArray<T> #53154
    Future
  • Add an analyzer warning of erroneous usage of MaxResponseHeadersLength #75137
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: System.Numerics Distance, Vector, Math Operations #83209
    Future
  • [wasm] Invoking async [JSExport] and [JSImport] kills the process on node, but works in browser #92713
    8.0.0
  • [maccatalyst] LLVM AOT build failure on iOS.Simulator.Aot-LLVM.Test #92827
    9.0.0
  • Network Traffic Statistics on Linux #91982
    9.0.0
  • Test failure System.Net.Security.Tests.ClientAsyncAuthenticateTest.ClientAsyncAuthenticate_MismatchProtocols_Fails(clientProtocol: Tls12, serverProtocol: Ssl3, expectedException: typeof(System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException)) #68476
    Future
  • System.Net.Security.Tests - Helix timeout on Mono #76019
    Future
  • JIT: Addressing mode is not recognized properly #92861
    9.0.0
  • Dereference of NULL pointer #92858
  • [API Proposal]: Suggestion for adding another argument to IServiceProvider.GetService() for a more control over lookup #91638
    Future
  • [browser] __arg_return.ToJS(__retVal); is generated twice in JSExport #92400
    8.0.0
  • [QUIC] Authentication failed because the remote party sent a TLS alert 'UserCanceled' #92669
  • System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration: SYSLIB0012 Assembly.CodeBase/EscapedCodeBase is obsolete #92752

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasm] Use intended ports when running DevServer #92913
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/8.0] Fix deadlock in EventPipeEventDispatcher #92912
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Arm64: Implement LoadAndReplicateToVector64x* and LoadAndReplicateToVector128x* APIs #92909
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Make BasicBlock::bbJumpKind private #92908
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0][wasm] Use intended ports when running `DevServer` #92906
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Cleanup iOS scenarios post HybridGlobalization scenario addition #92904
    area-Infrastructure
  • CI: Don't trigger runtime pipelines on perf pipeline only changes #92903
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure, perf-pipeline
  • Merge CoreCLR-based official builds legs into one leg per platform #92901
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • This vectorizes TensorPrimitives.Log2 #92897
    area-System.Numerics
  • [mono] Reenable MSVC warnings #92895
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [infra] Disable failing test on tvos with Native AOT #92893
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] [browser][nodejs] keep runtime alive for JSExport calls #92890
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Implement overrides for Span and ReadOnlySpan on SslStream #92889
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [release/8.0] [browser] Remove duplicated marshaling of return value for JSExport #92886
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Arm64 SIMD regs are now zeroed with movi instead of eor #92882
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Fix AOT for projects with space in path/name #92880
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • Fix zero/sign extend casts on arm64 #92875
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SPMI: Disable CodeQL in superpmi-collect pipeline #92872
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Merged

  • Fix deadlock in EventPipeEventDispatcher #92806
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 9.0.0
  • Remove 'tracing' from Native AOT PR runs #92825
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][android] Add Android linux-arm64 workload definitions #92899
    area-Build-mono
  • Update owner list #92900
    area-Meta
  • [wasm] Perf pipeline - fix blazor_scenarios run for hybrid globalization #92898
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline
  • [wasm] Set InstallV8ForTests=true only for windows/linux #92896
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [mono][wasm] Add linux-arm64 net8 workload definitions #92892
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix build of IJW test after VS upgrade #92878
    area-Host
  • [wasm] Disable MetricsSupport feature by default #92696
    area-Build-mono
  • [browser][nodejs] keep runtime alive for JSExport calls #92871
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Ensure the adapter name 100% matching when parsing proc/net/dev #92187
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Remove duplicated marshaling of return value for JSExport #92403
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Only emit pshufb when ssse3 is enabled. #92842
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Update intellisense.targets #92868
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [RISC-V] Fix target type unsignedness detection in genFloatToIntCast() #92694
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] regArg dependcies unrolling in genFnPrologCalleeRegArgs() #91904
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Check DotNetFinalVersionKind when setting WorkloadVersionSuffix #91792
    area-Infrastructure, needs-area-label
  • [llvm] Fix spilling of valuetypes to the stack if they are passed by … #92658
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono

Updated

  • Minimal ILGenerator implementation for new AssemblyBuilder.Save #92846
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Create IL-RT folder to store roundtripped IL assemblies and sources, removed suffix '.asm' to roundtripped files, re-enabled rejit ilasm roundtripping #90110
    area-ILTools-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • runtime-wasm-perf: add triggers for PRs #92799
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Merge stores #92852
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Merge tests under tracing / Reflection / ReadyToRun / Regressions #92029
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Arm64: Implement LoadVector64x* and LoadVector128x* APIs #92855
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Permissive handling for runtimeconfig.json #92037
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Start new per-host queue when an async over sync Dns call is cancelled #92862
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Use `add_linker_options` and `target_linker_options` in cmake #92844
    area-Infrastructure
  • Clean up the crossgen2_publish project and local/live packs references #92826
    area-Infrastructure
  • CI test #92354
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Implement standalone GC loading in NativeAOT #91038
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove base type rooting for types in rooted assemblies #92864
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Migrate from catch_all to catch in the jiterpreter and destroy exceptions #91364
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • SPMI: Simplify and improve reporting of context information #92824
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [CI ONLY] [NativeAOT] ObjWriter in C# #92705
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Support passing negative/positive numbers to methods. #92754
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix hwintrinsicChild->isContained() assert #90556
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Add support for byte/sbyte SIMD multiplication on XArch #86811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Format/Parse binary from/to BigInteger #85392
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Consider numeric string json for EnumConverter. #79432
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [mono][ios] Apple mobile template allows passing process arguments to the runtime #92772
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [mono][infra] Use llvm toolchain instead of binutils on linux #92057
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0][wasm][debugger] Support multidimensional indexing of object scheme #92753
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono][jit] Fuse SIMD extract and insert on arm64 #92714
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing of valuetype scheme #92637
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [browser][MT] running tests in a "sidecar" thread #92226
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Expand CreateSpan in T0 #91403
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Report Requires diagnostics from dataflow analyzer #92724
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Add analyzer support for inline array access #92736
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix Unnecessary sign-extension for `(nuint)span.Length` #88136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add log level and keyword tests for NativeRuntimeEventSource #89816
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Ability to request stackwalk per EventPipe session #84077
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve throughput / allocations of JsonNode.GetPath #92284
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [wasm] Having space in path fails builds #92399
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Move Microsoft.NETCore.DotNetAppHost off of pkgproj #92621
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add package readmes (continued) #92228
    area-Meta, 9.0.0
  • Update package description used types for System.IO.Hashing #92859
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
